snippet: A rental car veered off Sprain Brook Parkway in Greenburgh on Sunday, slammed into a bridge abutment and burst into flames.
abstract: Four people are killed when their rental car veers off Sprain Brook Parkway in Greenburgh, NY, slams into a bridge abutment and bursts into flames; cause of crash is not yet known.
lead_paragraph: A rental car veered off Sprain Brook Parkway in Greenburgh on Sunday, slammed into a bridge abutment and burst into flames.

headline.main: 4 Die in Car Crash in Westchester
headline.print_headline: 4 Die in Car Crash In Westchester
